modName: Werewolf Village Reboot (SUPPORT ENDED DO NOT DOWNLOAD)
descriptionHtml:
NO LONGER SUPPORTED! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS FILE! GO TO THIS INSTEAD: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=821697418

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to my mod. This is a mod which tries to bring back some roleplay into Skyrim. I highly recommend you try it. Please understand that this mod is a small mod, it has many features that are yet to be added.

The mod adds a little village in Dawnstar, just look on the map. 
Development status: Incomplete, progress is haulted for now. 

The mod adds an NPC (character) called Edward, he can be found in his own house located near the Abandoned Shack. 
Development status: Incomplete, work in progress. He is done, but the dialogue is constantly getting updated and patched. 

The mod adds a few books and items (vanilla items), which can be found in the village I added in Dawnstar. The Underforge in Whiterun, underneath the Skyforge has another book in there. 
Development status: Completed, more books will be added soon. 

Will I add any knew weapons and armor? Yes, but I can't make my own textures for them. So I will be using vanilla assets to create my weapons and armor. Development status: Planning stage, not in development yet. 

Will there be any quests and new characters? Yes, so far I have only got the long awaited Edward into the game. I haven't planned or started planning the quests, because the development of this mod is far too early for the quests. 
How many quests will be added? It depends on how people engage with my mod. I will be opening a discussion for players to give feedback and thoughts on my mod. 

Is there a team working on this mod? No, it's just me. I have no one who tests my mod, because I like to get updates out as fast and smoothly as possible. So I develop and test my mod myself.
author: WolfGum also known as LynxGaming1507
